amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas (HIDTA) program by $25 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add $25 million to the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas (HIDTA) program and reduce funding fir the IRS Processing Assistance and Management account by $25 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vitter amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 284 - 134 (Roll no. 421).
